posts.post_content: With all this investment in +1/+1 counters and such, your going to want to protect him from low-cost counters like [Unsummon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Unsummon) or [Oblivion Ring](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Oblivion Ring). Try using [Ranger's Guile](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ranger's Guile), [Sheltering Word](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sheltering Word), or [Ring of Evos Isle](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ring of Evos Isle).

posts.post_content:
this thing is way too powerful :<  
  
he dominates earlygame because of his low CMC and mystery pumping. nobody can predict how many creatures it's owner has to discard.  
  
then he dominates lategame because trample, regeneration, and the aforementioned pumping mechanic.  
  
That is stupid. a creature shouldn't be a clear no-brainer choice in any deck that matches its colors.
